sentences: Hello, how are you today?
I said hello but they didn't hear me.
translations: אמרתי שלום אבל הם לא שמעו אותי.

sentences: Goodbye, it was nice seeing you.
We waved goodbye as the train departed.
Please pass the salt.
Can you please help me with this?
translations: התוכל בבקשה לעזור לי עם זה?

sentences: Thank you for your help.
I wanted to say thank you for the gift.
I'm sorry for being late.
Sorry, I didn't mean to interrupt.
Yes, I will be there.
Did you enjoy the movie? Yes, I did.
No, thank you.
Is it raining? No, it's sunny.
translations: האם יורד גשם? לא, יש שמש.

sentences: I need a glass of water.
The water in the lake is very clear.
What kind of food do you like?
We ordered some delicious food at the restaurant.
I drink a cup of coffee every morning.
Would you like some coffee?
translations: אני שותה כוס קפה כל בוקר.

sentences: She prefers tea over coffee.
Let's have a cup of tea and relax.
He added milk to his cereal.
Do you want milk in your tea?
translations: הוא הוסיף חלב לדגני הבוקר שלו.

sentences: We need to buy some bread from the bakery.
She spread butter on the bread.
translations: אנחנו צריכים לקנות קצת לחם מהמאפייה.

sentences: Eating fruit is good for your health.
My favorite fruit is mango.
Carrots are a healthy vegetable.
We should eat more vegetables.
I'm reading a very interesting book.
She borrowed a book from the library.
Can I borrow your pen?
He wrote his name with a blue pen.
translations: הוא כתב את שמו בעט כחול.

sentences: I need a sharp pencil to draw.
She sketched the outline with a pencil.
translations: אני צריך עיפרון חד כדי לצייר.

sentences: I take notes in my notebook during class.
He jotted down his ideas in a small notebook.
translations: אני רושם הערות במחברת שלי במהלך השיעור.
הוא רשם את רעיונותיו במחברת קטנה.

sentences: I use my computer for work and entertainment.
She learned how to code on her new computer.
translations: אני משתמש במחשב שלי לעבודה ולבידור.
היא למדה איך לתכנת על המחשב החדש שלה.

sentences: I need to make a phone call.
Where did I put my phone?
I use the internet to find information.
The internet connection here is very fast.
translations: אני משתמש באינטרנט כדי למצוא מידע.

sentences: What's on television tonight?
They watched a movie on the television.
We listened to music on the radio.
The news is on the radio now.
I enjoy listening to different genres of music.
The concert had great live music.
translations: אני נהנה להקשיב לסוגי מוזיקה שונים.

sentences: Let's go see a movie this weekend.
That was a very exciting movie.
translations: בוא נלך לראות סרט בסוף השבוע הזה.

sentences: She is my best friend.
I'm meeting a friend for lunch.
translations: אני נפגש עם חבר לארוחת צהריים.

sentences: I love spending time with my family.
We are planning a family vacation.
translations: אני אוהב לבלות זמן עם המשפחה שלי.

sentences: My mother is a wonderful cook.
I called my mother to tell her the news.
translations: התקשרתי לאמא שלי לספר לה את החדשות.

sentences: My father taught me how to ride a bike.
I went fishing with my father last weekend.
translations: אבא שלי לימד אותי איך לרכוב על אופניים.
הלכתי לדוג עם אבא שלי בסוף השבוע שעבר.

sentences: I have an older brother.
My brother is coming to visit.
She has a younger sister.
My sister and I are very close.
The child was playing in the park.
Parents are responsible for their child's well-being.
The baby is sleeping peacefully.
She held the baby in her arms.
I go to school five days a week.
The school has a large playground.
translations: אני הולך לבית ספר חמישה ימים בשבוע.
לבית הספר יש מגרש משחקים גדול.

sentences: Our teacher is very knowledgeable.
I asked the teacher a question.
He is a diligent student.
The students are preparing for their exams.
The classroom was filled with desks and chairs.
The teacher wrote on the board in the classroom.
I have a lot of homework to do tonight.
Did you finish your homework?
translations: יש לי הרבה שיעורי בית לעשות הלילה.

sentences: I'm nervous about the upcoming exam.
She studied hard for the final exam.
We are going on holiday next month.
Christmas is my favorite holiday.
translations: חג המולד הוא החג האהוב עליי.

sentences: They went on a summer vacation to the beach.
I need a relaxing vacation.
translations: הם יצאו לחופשת קיץ לחוף הים.

sentences: I have a lot of work to do today.
He enjoys his work as a software engineer.
translations: יש לי הרבה עבודה לעשות היום.

sentences: She is looking for a new job.
He got a promotion at his job.
Money can't buy happiness.
I need to save money for a new car.
translations: אני צריך לחסוך כסף למכונית חדשה.

sentences: I need to go to the bank to deposit a check.
The bank is located downtown.
translations: אני צריך ללכת לבנק כדי להפקיד צ'ק.

sentences: We went to the store to buy groceries.
The store is having a big sale.
She likes to shop for clothes.
There's a new coffee shop on the corner.
We bought fresh vegetables at the farmers market.
The market was very crowded.
Let's eat at that new Italian restaurant.
We had a delicious meal at the restaurant.
translations: בוא נאכל במסעדה האיטלקית החדשה הזו.

sentences: What kind of food do you like?
We ordered some delicious food at the restaurant.
Can I get you a drink?
Water is a healthy drink.
translations: האם אני יכול להביא לך משקה?

sentences: I'm feeling hungry, I need a snack.
He packed a snack for his hike.
translations: אני מרגיש רעב, אני צריך נשנוש.

sentences: I need to wash my clothes.
She bought some new clothes at the mall.
translations: אני צריך לכבס את הבגדים שלי.
היא קנתה כמה בגדים חדשים בקניון.

sentences: He wore a blue shirt.
This shirt is very comfortable.
I need a new pair of pants.
These pants are too tight.
She wore a beautiful dress to the party.
That dress looks lovely on you.
I need to buy new shoes.
These shoes are very comfortable for walking.
It's cold outside, you should wear a jacket.
He has a leather jacket.
translations: קר בחוץ, אתה צריך ללבוש מעיל קל.

sentences: She wore a straw hat to protect herself from the sun.
He took off his hat when he entered the room.
translations: היא חבשה כובע קש כדי להגן על עצמה מהשמש.
הוא הוריד את כובעו כשנכנס לחדר.

sentences: Don't forget your gloves, it's freezing outside.
She wore warm wool gloves.
translations: אל תשכח את הכפפות שלך, קפוא בחוץ.

sentences: I need to do laundry, I'm out of clean socks.
He wore thick winter socks.
translations: אני צריך לעשות כביסה, נגמרו לי הגרביים הנקיות.

sentences: It's raining, you should wear a coat.
She has a long winter coat.
translations: יורד גשם, אתה צריך ללבוש מעיל.

sentences: Don't forget your umbrella, it might rain.
He opened his umbrella to shield himself from the sun.
translations: אל תשכח את המטרייה שלך, אולי יירד גשם.
הוא פתח את המטרייה שלו כדי להתגונן מהשמש.

sentences: The sun is shining brightly today.
We basked in the warm sun.
The moon looks beautiful tonight.
We sat outside under the light of the moon.
We could see many stars in the clear night sky.
He wished upon a shooting star.
translations: יכולנו לראות כוכבים רבים בשמי הלילה הבהירים.

sentences: The sky is blue and clear.
Dark clouds filled the sky before the storm.
translations: עננים כהים מילאו את השמיים לפני הסערה.

sentences: There are some fluffy white clouds in the sky.
The sun disappeared behind a dark cloud.
translations: יש כמה עננים לבנים ורכים בשמיים.

sentences: The rain started to fall heavily.
We stayed inside because of the rain.
It started to snow last night.
The ground was covered in a blanket of snow.
The wind was blowing strongly.
The leaves rustled in the wind.
A big storm is approaching.
We lost power during the storm.
We heard a loud clap of thunder.
The storm brought heavy rain and thunder.
A flash of lightning lit up the sky.
Be careful during the storm, there might be lightning.
translations: היזהר במהלך הסערה, עלול להיות ברקים.

sentences: It's very hot today.
The soup is still hot.
It's cold outside, wear a jacket.
The water in the lake was very cold.
The sun felt warm on my skin.
This blanket is nice and warm.
translations: השמש הרגישה חמימה על העור שלי.

sentences: The evening air was cool and refreshing.
Keep the drinks in a cool place.
